label: Keemple smart radiator
description: Electronic radiator thermostat, intended for use with water based room radiators.

metadata.inclusion:
• Ensure smart radiator valve is factory reset. 
• Activate “Inclusion” on the Z-Wave controller. 
• Quickly press and release menu button (one with a dot) on smart radiator valve. 
• Observe both controller and smart radiator valve for status of the process.
metadata.exclusion:
• Activate “Exclusion” on the Z-Wave controller. 
• Quickly press and release menu button (one with a dot) on smart radiator valve. 
• Observe both controller and smart radiator valve for status of the process.
metadata.reset:
Remove the battery cover and take out one battery. 
Press and hold menu button (one with a dot) for approx. 5 seconds, while re-inserting the battery. 
Smart radiator valve is now factory reset and in mounting mode.
